overview.title: Modal Component
overview.description: Modals are dialog boxes that appear on top of the main content.

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: JS is required to control the visibility of the modal.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Modals should be easy to dismiss (e.g., with an 'X' button or Escape key).

questions.question: What is a key accessibility feature for a modal dialog?
answers: It should trap focus within the modal
It should automatically close after 5 seconds
questions.answer: It should trap focus within the modal
